YEAR:                       1984

GENRE:                      Fantasy / Sci-Fi / Romance


SYNOPSIS/PLOT: 

A race of alien energy beings encounter the Voyager II probe, which contains a 
message welcoming anybody that finds the probe to come and visit Earth. Taking 
mankind at its word, an ambassador is sent to visit Earth. 
However the ship is shot down over Wisconsin by the US Air Force. The alien 
makes its way from the wreckage to the nearby home of widow Jenny Hayden. There 
it synthesizes a human body out of the genetic structure of a lock of her late 
husband ScottÃƒâ€ s hair. She is shocked to seemingly see Scott alive again. The 
Starman then forcibly makes her to take it to a rendezvous with its mothership 
in Arizona in three days time. Her fear starts to mellow as she comes to 
sympathize with the alienÃƒâ€ s struggling to understand the human condition. 
Meanwhile however government agents follow their trail determined to capture the 
Starman.
